name: Burn The Mob
description:
Burn the Mob is a simple but addicting physics-based puzzle game. You play as the Witch - a poor woman who is getting tired of being burned on the stake all the time. You decide to reverse the roles. After all, you went through it many times, you know how it works, right?

Cast spells by sneezing in a very cute way.

Deflect the torch to the mob.

Watch them burn!
